column4: I have a hardisk of 500 GB. First, I have installed ubuntu 8.10 on 50 gb and then i have installed xp pro sp2 on 450 gb. My problem is that when i turn on pc it starts with xp. So with live cd ubuntu I have typed in terminal a series of strings, and now my pc starts with ubuntu, but I don't see xp. help help
now I have upgraded ubuntu version to 9.04
but i don't see xp the same
in a terminal type gksu gedit /boot/grub/menu.lst. edit this you will
